reg_pit.title:
Amalgamation of Regional Health Boards and
Community Health Councils Regulation

change.changenote: Section 6 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 211/2015, effective November 28, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 16 of the Health Authorities Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 180, a regional health board or community health council may indemnify a former director of a designated corporation on amalgamation of the designated corporation with the regional health board or community health council, on the same basis that applies to directors or former directors of a regional health board or community health council under section 30 (2) to (4) of the Society Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 433.
